1.16.4.3.2.3: Fixed an error earning the 'Captain' advancement that prevented players from getting in a boat
1.16.4.3.2.2: Now properly syncs title data on respawn and dimension changes
1.16.4.3.2.1: Fixed a server crash caused by accessing client-only content on server
1.16.4.3.2.0: Lots of changes. To see a detailed changelog, go to changelog.txt in the github repo

1.12.2.3.1.7: Now properly syncs title data on respawn and dimension changes
1.12.2.3.1.6: Improved pattern matching to prevent errors of mods with weird lang file entries for advancements
1.12.2.3.1.5: Renamed es_es.lang to es_ES.lang so Minecraft would recognize it
1.12.2.3.1.4: Somehow I deleted the @SubscribeEvent annotation from the method that updates the player's name. Derp.
1.12.2.3.1.3: Added es_es.lang, added config option to disable loot, and a few other things
1.12.2.3.1.2: Fixed a client side crash. Not even sure what caused it to happen or how what I did fixed it
1.12.2.3.1.1: Fixed a server side crash caused by referencing a client only class
1.12.2.3.1.0: Titles are now data-driven, making it easier for modpack devs to add their own
1.12.2.3.0.0: Lots of changes. See the changelog for details
1.12.2.2.1.0: Added page counter and config options to change the title colors
1.12.2.2.0.1: Fixed a crash while on a server due to call to client side only class
1.12.2.2.0.0: BIG Minecraft version jump. New GUI.
